dialogues.content: (Today is the 100th day left to the entrance exam and I must try my best!)

dialogues.name: Dad
dialogues.content: Our dreams weave through your path, Vincent. We know youâ€™ll forge the way with your success.

dialogues.name: Mom
dialogues.content: Keep your eyes on the prize, Vincent. Don't let fleeting moments derail your journey.

dialogues.name: Mom
dialogues.content: Your destiny hinges on the college entrance examination, and it's not just your fate but also the fate of our entire family.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: I know, Mom. I'll try my best.
